Head Blacksmith Ferris:
I need some Reinforced Iron Piece. It's made by applying magic to Iron Ore. There aren't any Mystics around, so we'll have to improvise... Creatures known as Lost Steel Golem and Frost Steel Golem can be found in Frozen Labyrinth. Peel off some of its scrap and bring it to me! I'll need about five pieces. These golems are quite durable, and won't peel away easily. Give it all you've got!
